subject: Re: Abuse - Inappropriate Material - junit@yahoogroups.com  (KMM54613869V93979L0KM)
msgSnippet: ... to our ... I kicked etoys as soon as I saw the spam. There are two sourceforge lists.  I have no problem with people using them, personally I find that the
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., "Philippe Vanpeperstraete"
<philippe.vanpeperstraete@s...> wrote:
> Dear all,
>
> This is the reaction I received from Yahoo about the spamming sent
to our
> list recently. Any reactions? Time to look for a better platform?
>

I kicked etoys as soon as I saw the spam.

There are two sourceforge lists. I have no problem with people using
them, personally I find that the search option is often broken though.

I have no plans on moderating this list (I believe I have stated that
before). Though if the level of spam increases I will change the
membership to restricted.

--
Erik Meade emeade@...
Senior Consultant Object Mentor, Inc.
http://www.junit.org
